item.title: Debunking Kafka Top 5 Use Cases
item.description: Infographics are easy and quick to look at and they are posted everywhere. But are they actually correct? Not really. Here’s an example of the “Top 5 use cases for Kafka” that aren’t actually valid use-cases at all. YouTube Check out my YouTube channel, where I post all kinds of content accompanying my posts, including this video… Read More »Debunking Kafka Top 5 Use Cases The post Debunking Kafka Top 5 Use Cases appeared first on CodeOpinion.
